meanings.definition: A person who participates in the sport of wakeboarding.
meanings.sent1: The wakeboarders glided gracefully on the water.
meanings.sent2: Many wakeboarders enjoy performing tricks and jumps.
meanings.sent3: The wakeboarders laughed as they splashed each other playfully.
meanings.sent4: The group of wakeboarders painted the lake with their colorful boards.
meanings.sent5: The wakeboarders' energy and enthusiasm were contagious.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of wakeboarders at the lake.
meanings.sent2: The wakeboarders' boards were lined up neatly on the shore.
meanings.sent3: The wakeboarders cheered each other on as they took turns.
meanings.sent4: The wakeboarders' laughter echoed across the water.
meanings.sent5: The wakeboarders' camaraderie was evident in their interactions.
